title: Crystal-Powered Train Station Adventure #16
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Station Control Room
rooms.description: A dimly lit control room filled with brass gauges and glowing crystal displays. The walls are lined with pipes that pulse with blue energy. A large control panel dominates the center, and through the window you can see the empty train platform below. The air hums with crystalline power.

items.name: main control panel
items.description: A complex panel with three compartments and various crystal-powered switches

items.name: station operations manual
items.description: A leather-bound manual with technical specifications
items.text: Station Manual: This facility was built on May 28th (5/28). Chief Engineer Marcus Stone oversees all operations. The crystal resonance chamber powers the entire station. Remember: only authorized personnel may access the power crystals.

items.name: small brass key
items.description: A key with a crystal emblem engraved on the handle

items.name: metal filing cabinet
items.description: A tall cabinet filled with station records and blueprints

items.name: engineering logbook
items.description: A notebook filled with technical diagrams and notes
items.text: Engineer's Log: The blue crystals provide power to the entire station. The train requires a fully charged power crystal to operate. Chief Engineer Stone keeps the master crystal in the secure chamber. The platform access code is based on our founding date.

items.name: secure storage cabinet
items.description: A reinforced cabinet with a brass lock

items.name: platform access card
items.description: A metal card that grants access to the train platform

items.name: door to platform
items.description: A heavy metal door with a card reader leading down to the platform

rooms.name: Crystal Train Platform
rooms.description: A vast platform with gleaming rails that glow with blue crystal energy. A magnificent steam train sits at the platform, its boiler powered by a large crystal chamber. The walls are decorated with murals showing the history of crystal technology. A reinforced door to the east leads to the power chamber.

items.name: crystal powered steam train
items.description: A beautiful locomotive with brass fittings and a crystal power core visible through glass panels
items.text: The train's nameplate reads: 'Aurora Express - Powered by Crystal Technology'. A notice states: 'Requires fully charged master crystal to operate.'

items.name: historical mural about Marcus Stone
items.description: A painting depicting the station's construction
items.text: Mural inscription: 'Chief Engineer Marcus Stone - Founder of the Crystal Railway System. His vision brought power to the rails.'

items.name: historical mural about crystal discovery
items.description: A painting showing the discovery of power crystals
items.text: Mural inscription: 'The crystals were discovered deep in the resonance chamber beneath the station, where they continue to power our world.'

items.name: historical mural about the first journey
items.description: A painting of the first train departure
items.text: Mural inscription: 'The first journey departed to the city of New Haven, marking a new era of transportation.'

items.name: wooden platform bench
items.description: A worn bench where passengers once waited

items.name: old newspaper
items.description: A yellowed newspaper from the station's opening day
items.text: HEADLINE: Crystal Railway Opens! Chief Engineer Marcus Stone celebrates as the first train departs for New Haven. The revolutionary crystal power system promises unlimited clean energy.

items.name: abandoned ticket booth
items.description: A small booth with a locked drawer

items.name: security memorandum
items.description: An official document about chamber access
items.text: SECURITY MEMO: Access to the crystal resonance chamber requires answering three security questions. Only Chief Engineer Stone and authorized personnel may enter. Questions verify knowledge of station history and purpose.

items.name: reinforced chamber door
items.description: A massive door with crystal-powered locks. A brass panel displays three security questions.

password_questions.question: Who founded the Crystal Railway System?
password_questions.hint: Check the station manual and the murals on the platform

password_questions.question: Where are the power crystals located?
password_questions.hint: The engineer's notes and murals mention this location

password_questions.question: What city did the first train travel to?
password_questions.hint: Read the newspaper and the mural about the first journey

rooms.name: Crystal Resonance Chamber
rooms.description: You have entered the heart of the station! A magnificent chamber filled with towering blue crystals that pulse with energy. In the center, on a pedestal of polished stone, rests the master power crystal - a flawless gem the size of a human head, glowing with intense blue light. The crystals hum in harmony, and you can feel the power flowing through the station. A passage leads back to the platform, and the train awaits.

items.name: master power crystal
items.description: A magnificent crystal radiating pure energy, the key to powering the escape train

items.name: stone pedestal
items.description: A pedestal of carved stone holding the master crystal

items.name: towering crystal formations
items.description: Massive blue crystals growing from floor to ceiling
items.text: The crystals resonate with a deep hum. Inscribed at their base: 'These crystals have powered the station since its founding. May they light the way for all travelers.'

items.name: passage back to platform
items.description: A glowing passage leading back to the train platform

rooms.name: Departing Train
rooms.description: You have successfully powered the crystal train! The master crystal now glows brilliantly in the engine's power chamber. Steam hisses from the valves as the train comes to life. The whistle blows, and the train begins to move along the glowing rails. Through the windows, you see the station falling away as you speed toward freedom and adventure.

items.name: luxurious train interior
items.description: Plush seats and crystal-powered lamps create a warm, inviting atmosphere

items.name: crystal engine room
items.description: The master crystal pulses with energy, driving the train forward

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You have restored power to the crystal train and escaped the abandoned station! The Aurora Express carries you away from the mysterious facility, powered by the ancient crystal technology. As the station disappears behind you, you wonder what other secrets the crystal railway system holds. You win!
